title: despicable me?
content:
anyone know if the font used for the upcoming 'despicable me' movie is a commercial face, or a custom one-off?

it looks so familiar to me, but i can't find it anywhere.

[http://www.despicable.me/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415101411/http:/www.despicable.me/ "http://www.despicable.me/")
author: tyleryoung

comments.content: found it: las vegas jackpot by house industries :)
